name: Professional Mahjong Gok?
description: Professional Mahjong Gok? features several variations of the game of four-player mahjong. The main idea behind mahjong games is that players receive and discard tiles until they complete hands by forming groups and pairs. The game also features a plethora of options to customize the rules of the game to their liking.
alsoFor: FM-7, FM Towns, NES, PC-88, PC-98, Sharp X68000 | Combined View
